creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
1. create a new group "mygroup"
2. create a new user and add it to "mygroup"
3. give this user "edit" and "review" rights on a certain sitetree node

-> if this user goes to the site area, the sitetree won't be displayed, and
there's a javascript error message "Could not load sitetree XML"

Created attachment 17062
patch against rev 348741

this patch replaces the area by "info-authoring" in the url of the javascript,
so the javascript files can be loaded correctly.
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org

text:
Created attachment 17063
patch against rev 349405

same patch, now for rev 349405
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org

text:
